preferencedCodes

private static final int[] preferencedCodes
The proxy SHOULD give preference to responses that provide information affecting resubmission of request, such as 401, 407, 415, 420, and 484

addFinalResponse

public void addFinalResponse(Response response)
Adds final response to this response context. If response is not final, it will not be added

Parameters:
response - Response

getResponsesByStatusCodeClass

public static java.util.Vector getResponsesByStatusCodeClass(java.util.Vector responses,
                                                             int statusClass)
Chooses among all responses those that have specified statusClass (i.e. 1 for 1XX, 2 for 2XX etc.)

Parameters:
responses - Responses vector
statusClass - Status code class
Returns:
Vector with responses that have specified statusClass

getBestResponse

public Response getBestResponse(MessageFactory messageFactory)
                         throws java.text.ParseException
Chooses the best responses from vector of final responses. Also performs auth headers aggregation as specified in section 16.7 step 7.

Parameters:
messageFactory - MessageFactory object for constructing responses
Returns:
The best response
Throws:
java.text.ParseException

aggregateAuthHeaders

private Response aggregateAuthHeaders(Response bestResponse)
performs auth headers aggregation as specified in section 16.7 step 7.

Parameters:
bestResponse - Best response
Returns:
The same response with aggregated auth headers
